com.symbol.emdk.barcode

Interface BarcodeManager.ScannerConnectionListener

  • Enclosing class:
    BarcodeManager

    public static interface BarcodeManager.ScannerConnectionListener
    An interface for notifying client applications when the external scanner is connected or disconnected to the mobile device. 

     Example Usage:
  public class MainActivity extends Activity implements ScannerConnectionListener
  .. .. ..

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onConnectionChange(ScannerInfo scannerInfo, BarcodeManager.ConnectionState connectionState)
      Called to notify the client when the scanner device has been connected or disconnected to the mobile device.

    • Method Detail

      • onConnectionChange

        void onConnectionChange(ScannerInfo scannerInfo,
                      BarcodeManager.ConnectionState connectionState)
        Called to notify the client when the scanner device has been connected or disconnected to the mobile device.
        Parameters:
        scannerInfo - The ScannerInfo object of the affected scanner.
        connectionState - The new connection state.
